TopicTitle: Science progression realism in career and science mode.

Articles.Content: When I play career or science mode it feels kind of off due to the fact that you are doing manned spaceflight in early game, heck you only get wheels at the end of the tech tree! I think that there should be a submode for career and science mode that has a realistic science progression that's of course optional to use due to everyone's different play styles. (And the fact that new players usually get the game because they want to put Kerbals into space)
